content: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. May I have your name, please, so I can assist with your electrical service request?
Thank you, Howard. Can you please provide the address where you need the electrical service?
Thank you! Could you let me know a few times that would be best for you to have an electrician come out?
Morning is best for me, next week any day.
Great! Let me check our availability for morning appointments next week.
The earliest available slots we have are Tuesday, May 20 at 10:30 AM and Thursday, May 22 at 11:15 AM. Would either of those work for you?
Neither of those work for me. I'm busy those mornings. Do you have anything earlier, maybe around 8:00?

I'm sorry, but all of our morning appointments next week start at 10:30 AM or later. I can add you to a waitlist for earlier slots if one opens up, or look at availability in the following week if that's helpful.
No, that's not going to work for me. Thanks anyway.
reason: Customer unavailable during offered time slots.
